question: Shamsur Rahman Faruqi, who recently passed away, was associated with which field?
explanation:
One of the greatest modern Urdu writers, Shamsur Rahman Faruqi has recently passed away at the age of 85 years.
He was known for formulating a modernist framework for evaluating Urdu literature. He was a recipient of numerous awards including the prestigious Saraswati Samman and the Sahitya Akademi award.
